templates.name: Audit Plan
templates.description: Audting the figures of a company.

fields.label: Audit Scope
fields.placeholder:
Inventory risk assessment
Audit consists of XXX hours of work

fields.label: Audit Process
fields.placeholder: The audit process consists of inspection, data collection, inquiries with employees, review of documents, etc.

rows:
Risk assessment
- Understanding of client business
 -Scrutinize financial statements

Compliance checklist
 - Inventory risk checklist
 - Sugesstions

Further audit procedures
- Inspecting warehouse and factory
 - Physical counting of inventory
 - Reconcile the physical inventory count to the general ledger

Audit evidence
 - Resulting documents from the implementation of the audit procedure

Reporting
- Draft report
- Follow-up meeting
- Discussion on risks and recommendations
- Incorporation of comments
 - Final report

fields.label: Conclusion
fields.placeholder: We expect to submit our final report for this audit by XXX hours. Our findings and recommendations will be discussed with the management before the submission of the final report.

templates.name: Tax compliance tracker
templates.description: UPDATE YOUR TRACKER EVERY YEAR TO KEEP TRACK OF YOUR TAXES. FORMATTED TO EASILY USE TEMPLATE.
